website_summaries.verdict: At budget-friendly bottle of waterless wash that includes a good, reliable wax.
pros: The combination wash and wax leaves a nice shine on the surface after gentle rubbing, without leaving water spots
The finish is glossy while leaving the paint color clear
cons: The cleaning solution can leave some streaks or dirt spots on the surface of most vehicles

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, not a replacement for a real wash
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok solution if you have a light amount of dust on your car. Not a substitute for a real wash if moderately soiled. I have a black car and it worked decently but I gained a few extra (very light) swirls on the clear coat. It'll probably be invisible on any other color paint. If you have a black car use this product cautiously.
customer_reviews.author: Rusuh

customer_reviews.title: does the trick, works well
customer_reviews.text: stuff works great. Just cleaned my harley up with it a few days ago and I forgot how nice it cleaned up. My first bottle did arrive broken from Amazon but they were fantastic about it and sent me a new bottle right away. Have to admit, I was skeptical but it does a pretty decent job, i dont know if I'd want to do a whole car/suv/truck with this stuff but it would get the job done just take time. It cleaned things up so well that I kept finding more areas to wipe down.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Best waterless wash and after wash spray.
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy Adams polishes for pretty much everything. I decided to give this a shot and I won’t be going back to Adams for waterless wash. This is cheaper, you get more & works better. Washed my car with this on Thursday. Rained heavy Friday night and my car still looks clean with zero water spots. Never had that result with Adams or any other brand. Also, you don’t use much at all.
customer_reviews.author: Myles

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product lives up to what was advertised. I bought this because I got my car washed, however I parked it under some trees and my car looked like I didn't even get it washed. I live in an apartment complex and do not have access to a hose. I refuse to pay for another car wash hence I resulted to this item. It left my car clean and shiny. The shine isn't like the extra shine when you take it to the car wash but I like this item and will research a wax product I can use right after this to give the extra shine. The shine factor in my opinion is 93%.
customer_reviews.author: kerry

customer_reviews.title: Quality.
customer_reviews.text: I hate to one star this because I’m not picky but first package I got had a hole. The replacement the nozzle leaks so much per spray. I love the company I use detailing equipment almost everyday. Their other wax has a lot better smell almost like coconuts. This, the wax liquid felt cheap. Didn’t dry off good. Obviously don’t use them as an actual waterless wash. Just overall wasn’t impressed by this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Scott

customer_reviews.title: waterless cleaning
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works, allows you to wash wax quickly. It wont get everything off, stubborn spots may need extra applications and some wont come off. But for a lightly soiled vehicle this stuff is good. It's great if you have washed the car and don't have time to do a realwax job. and just want to give it some wax protection. Plus it will get the dirty spots you may have missed in the wash. This will be great for my antique car which gets driven then put away in the garage, where it can get a quick application to remove road dust if I ever get that running again.
customer_reviews.author: A Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff there is
customer_reviews.text: I have a collectible car with a perfect paint job, my detailer suggested I use this. It is hands-down the easiest product to use with the best outcome. However you can buy off the shelf for half the price. I’m not sure why it’s so overpriced on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Neilio

customer_reviews.title: It may be the best wash and wax spray....but
customer_reviews.text: It may be the best wash and wax spray....but as others have noted, the spray bottle has a defect, one of mine started a slow leak at bottom of spray bottle, leaked all into my trunk. Another time, didn't leak at all. I'll keep going back to this, I recently compared to "Mothers" wash n wax spray, I think the Meguiar one is easier to buff out its streaks. Next time I buy, I'm pouring into my own spray bottle. Yes, its that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Socali 33

customer_reviews.title: Conserve water without deglecting your beautiful ride.
customer_reviews.text: I had another waterless wash brand I swore by but thought I would try Meguiar's. I don't use my car often and it's always covered in the garage. I do accumulate a little dust on it and using up a lot of water to wash it is unnecessary. Therefore I like to use the waterless wash. This has always worked well and it makes me feel like I'm doing my part to conserve water without compromising the looks of my vehicle. Meguair's makes it sparkle and it lays down good protection. It does a fabulous job and so proud of my finished product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Blevins

customer_reviews.title: I call it a hooker bath for the car
customer_reviews.text: I have a White M3 that loves to get a little dirty just from pollen and road dirt almost every time I drive her. This waterless car wash is the perfect in-between solution as it doesn't leave any marks and doesn't scratch the paint of my car. I use ultra soft microfiber clothes when I "wash" and they get super dirty but totally worth not spending an hour washing the car every other day. Perfect to keep in the trunk for drives when you want to be able take pictures but dont have a car wash nearby.
customer_reviews.author: Keenan Chance

customer_reviews.title: A Detailer's Dream
customer_reviews.text: Get two microfiber towels and your are ready for business. One to spread product and the other to wipe away. I did my black 17 Dodge Durango in 20 minutes and gives you that just waxed shiny look if applied correctly. Use after a rainy day if vehicle is not too dirty and between washes. It's almost like getting your vehicle waxed but in less time but same results. They product smells amazing and worth the price. If you want to save money between washes and maintain the look of your vehicle this is a must have. Another fine product from Meguiars.
customer_reviews.author: C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Do not use.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans without scratches. Does not remove water spots, but exacerbates water spots and after application instead of beading water the beads turn into water spots that need to be polished to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to wash your vehicle !
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about two years now and it works great. Just spray it on one section at a time , wipe with a microfiber towel and buff lightly off to a clean and shiny finish. I just did my 2020 Ford Edge today in about 15-20 minutes and it looks fantastic. My only complaint is that it is a bit expensive for what it is but considering the cost of a regular car wash with wax it is really cheap. So I contradicted myself ! Anyway , I love this stuff !
customer_reviews.author: Walt in VT

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, performs better
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing and smells sooo good. I only drive my classic car on nice days to shows or wherever. I use this to clean it every time. This is not meant for filthy daily driven cars. It's for light cleaning. You can use this on almost every piece of your car, plastic trim, windows, paint, ect. It does not leave swirls! My car is black and has no orange peel and I been using this for I'd say 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Leaking container
customer_reviews.text: I saw a review before I bought this product that said the container was leaking when received. I hoped I would be luckier but I wasn't. Mine has a very slow leak. I was able to use it on my car once. The leak made the effort more difficult and the end result was not as good as it might have been. The leak is slow enough that I can probably do a follow up job. However if this product is to continue mail sales, I think the container problem needs to be addressed.
customer_reviews.author: The OC

customer_reviews.title: Very Good For the Price
customer_reviews.text: I own a 2018 Honda Civic Hatchback. I'd say this is one of the best products I've used to wipe down a car. I usually take an hour or more for a car wash. With this, I only take 20-30 minutes max. Like the others said, wipe it down if it's heavy on dust or really dirty; otherwise you can kiss your towels goodbye. The spray will stick the dirt on your towels and it will be hard to wash off. But I like this because it's really quick. I use it on the outside of my windows too. It's helps with the water streaks and squeaking noises.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: First time trying this type of cleaner. 1. We hosed the car top to bottom. This process is to remove debris 2. We used a soft cloth 3. End result the car was clean and shiny Apologies no picture but we clean another car same day with a 2 in 1 cleaner (soap and wax) and the result were identical. Difference is less wet. Ideal if you like to clean your own car and does not have full access to water or just saving water.
customer_reviews.author: TheReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Price and performance
customer_reviews.text: Update: I've got just a few ounces left. I still like it, and will buy it again. Although Griott's Speed Shine is calling me. I really like that, too. Meg's is a brand I've come to trust for good to very good detailing products, at good to very good prices. I use this on my new car to clean off dust and pollen. It works as expected. This is a nice size bottle with a good sprayer. I used it once for light dust today, and the bottle is still about 90% full.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff for keeping the bike clean
customer_reviews.text: Attn Bike Owners this product works great for keeping your bike clean in between the major washes. I used it today on my Harley after taking a ride. On the way back it had rained and the ground was still wet. When I got back the bike was a bit dirty. This product worked great cleaning up the bike and making it shine. I was using Mist n Shine but this product costs almost half as much (Mist n Shine .74 an oz Meguiar's .38 an oz)
customer_reviews.author: RetDetSgt

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Great
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at how well this product worked. It's simple enough, just spray it on, wipe up the dust/dirt, and buff it dry with a separate towel. I used about 3/4 of a bottle on my Mazda CX-5. The car looks just as it did when I picked it up from a professional detailer last time I had it done, and that cost me $150. So far it's been about a week since I "washed" it and it still looks great, even after a few rain storms. I only wish Auto Zone stocked this stuff, because I'd gladly buy more.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ensley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for a while now on all my cars including my nice cars. Goes on easy and comes off easy. I do run the cars through a cheap touch less wash before using it to remove any heavy dirt. Our black SUV comes out awesome with no spots. Can be used on glass and plastics. Have tried the more expensive products and this product always always wins. I keep it in the car to clean up bird droppings quickly so it doesn’t damage the paint. Use a good quality micro fiber cloth with it and you will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use it
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. I’ve never cleaned my moped before because I don’t have any water access around me. This time I purchased this product and it was an amazing result for me. It was easy to use it and my moped is shining now. I just simply sprayed it on my moped and I wiped out by the microfiber towel. The product removed the dust immediately. I was impressed! I would definitely recommended
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: This stuff REALLY WORKS WITHOUT SCRATCHING THE FINISH!
customer_reviews.text: Was initially very skeptical that this would work without scratching the paint/finish on my car. However, after spraying this on my car, I was able to feel the "high lubricity" as described in the product info that the spray left on the car. This spray is formulated to not leave any scratch marks. And I would also recommend using the Meguiar's X2020 Supreme Shine Microfiber Cloths to gently wipe off the spray. I was very pleased with how this product worked. My car looked like it was professionally detailed. I used about 1/6 of the bottle to clean the entire exterior of my mid-sized sedan. I used a separate glass cleaner for the windows and side mirror and headlights.
customer_reviews.author: Charles L

customer_reviews.title: Speedy way to wash and wax your vehicle (or boots :) without needing water
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been sold on their detailed for many years. I had avoided this product because it appeared expensive. I was wrong. The size is large compared with the competition and one bottle cleans and waxes my truck about five times — so it is a bargain. Have started using it on my motorcycle and it works better than anything else that I have tried. Cuts bugs, grit, dirt — even cleans the wheel wells — without struggling. I started using it on my boots for a quick clean and shine and the results are terrific!
customer_reviews.author: DrEAM

customer_reviews.title: Easy car wash and wax for a 62 year old woman. SUV shiny again and smells good too
customer_reviews.text: Was my first time to clean our car since my husband got sick. Took me less that an hour to clean and wax an suv with this Meguiar's Ultimate wash and wax. Used only little amount, with the microfiber towels that I bought together with this product. Maybe It will take about 5 or 6 times of use before I buy another. Recommend this product, especially if you are living in places where car washing is restricted in residential areas. Where city's supply and use of water is very much controlled.
customer_reviews.author: HomeShopper

customer_reviews.title: Works ok but not better than other products
customer_reviews.text: I guess it works but 303 Aerospace detail spray with UV protectant works a lot better for even washing a car waterless. This was kind of hard to use with the microfiber towels the 303 works much smoother. This doesn't leave a smooth finish like the 303 does. Little disappointed won't buy again. But don't get me wrong it does work for a waterless car wash.
customer_reviews.author: M Croteau

customer_reviews.title: Talk about Goodness
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to use. I have a brand new car so of course my car was already shiny however it was getting dusty and dirty; I did want to go thur the car wash due to the harsh chemicals etc. it can ruin the cars paint. So yes, I love this product, it’s safe on your car and boyee does it really shine up your vehicle. For the price it’s 💯 percent Awesome and a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Babygal422

customer_reviews.title: Coconut flavor goodness
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, works great. Too bad they use a cheap, brittle plastic for the bottle. It's unlike the usual plastic that other sprays use like Windex or whatever. Mine dropped off a table and it shattered. My first bottle I had thought it was a fluke, but the bottle is just so delicate and cracks easily.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy
customer_reviews.text: If your car is not super dirty this will work perfectly. Used on entire body and wheels. It's best used in between car washes when your car is semi clean and even better for motorcycles which require less surface area to clean.
customer_reviews.author: FX

customer_reviews.title: Broken Nozzle
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with broken nozzle so most of the liquid spilled out. Post office had to put the delivered box in 2 plastic bags which are filled with the liquid.
customer_reviews.author: tqt19426

customer_reviews.title: Works well when you can see it.
customer_reviews.text: I found that the spray was easy to apply and wipe off. It is able to clean a car that is a little dirty. I don't think it would work real well after driving through mud or snow salt. I only gave this 4 stars because the spray is clear. My car is white. as a result, I could never see where I had already wiped it off.
customer_reviews.author: mr.shoeman

customer_reviews.title: Goes a long way and works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! I went months without running water due to a collapsed well where I live, and this was the only way I could wash my car (no car wash because my back bumper is damaged and I'm afraid it'll tear off). I have a Civic, and since it's a smaller car, it really doesn't take much of this to clean the whole thing. And it REALLY LOOKS GOOD! Better than using soap and water, and a lot easier. I've washed my car three times and I've barely used any of the bottle up.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Meguiar's never cases to amaze me
customer_reviews.text: I seriously love this stuff. It's the perfect product. It genuinely does a great job of cleaning your vehicle. It's so much of a hassle for me to drag out my 100' hose to clean my truck and sometimes it's not even that dirty, just some light dirt, but ever since I got this... it's so easy and now I can make my vehicle look beautiful at anytime I want at any time of day :) its seriously some awesome stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long to go waterless!
customer_reviews.text: Simple to wipe on and off and leaves a great shine. Perfect for those times when you get rained on or splashed up from a wet road and have a little to medium amount of dirt on your car. I got 8 "washes" from the first bottle I bought on my large size sedan. I use high quality microfiber towels and they leave no scratches in the paint. This is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: k9

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with a great shine.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have a white police car that has not been washed in weeks. Lots of dust and pollen. Simply spray on and wipe off. Take a clean rag to buff. It took several rags to get the dirt off the entire car but once buffed I could see my reflection. Washed in my garage. No clean-up. Great smell. Your rag glides across the car. Much easier than washing and waxing the old fashioned way.
customer_reviews.author: David V.

customer_reviews.title: Did not expect be so impressed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always liked the idea of waterless/bucketless wash products, but was also weary the products wouldn’t produce the results I wanted. This product exceeded my expectations. I’ve come to the conclusion I will be only buying Meguairs products from now on. I quickly learned you need very little of this product to produce good results. I used one microfiber cloth, sprayed the cloth and wiped, then used another, dry cloth to pick up any remaining residue and dirt. The shine and waxed finish is impressive. If your car is truly dirty you will need multiple cloths as you’ll simply end up pushing dirt around the paint.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but wouldn’t use on a highly soiled car
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I’ve tried two other waterless wash and waxs (the other top ranked ones on amazon) but keep coming back to this one. Not a true wax (not great longevity) but leaves the “buttery” smooth feeling on the paint after use. I only use on a lightly soiled car (dried rain marks, light dust/pollen, etc). I wouldn’t use in a heavily soiled car for fear of scratching the paint. One bottle will typically last 3-4 washes on a full size car or small SUV, depending on how saturated you want to spray on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great waterless wash, really convenient if you want to clean your vehicle, but don't want to go through the hassle of a full water wash. Only use on a lightly soiled vehicle, this is not for a very dirty vehicle. Also, don't use on your vehicle if the vehicle is hot, use in shade or early morning/late afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: My Tesla Model 3 loves this
customer_reviews.text: I was suspicious that this waterless wash is almost like an expensive water in a spray bottle. It turns out that it does its job very well! Unless you let the car to get real dirty, it will make all the dirt and dust go away with a single swipe. Make sure you have lots of microfiber towels for the best result.
customer_reviews.author: Vladislavs Dovgalecs

customer_reviews.title: My Mercury Cougar Loves This Product!
customer_reviews.text: Meguiar's is tops when it comes to car polish & wax & wash products. This product was easy to apply with a microfiber cloth and gave really good results. Very convenient product when you don't want to hastle with the old garden hose, bucket and sponge. Spray on and wipe off. Then buff with a separate microfiber cloth for a nice clean shine. My Mercury Cougar loves this product and so do I!
customer_reviews.author: Radical Dave

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Apparently I have new car anxiety lol! This stuff is amazing! I bought a black Lexus convertible and it looks great clean, but dirty, not so much. I got it professionally detailed for $200 and looked great. This stuff literally makes it look the same as it did when it was first detailed. I used lots of towels and only apply it in the shade. I am seriously considering only using this stuff to wash. Beats the hassle of doing the 2 bucket method for washing (takes forever!!!!) You won’t regret buying this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Paul

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good.
customer_reviews.text: I live in a condo in a big city so I can't wash my black car myself. I wasn't expecting this to work and was fully ready to be disappointed, but I was pleasantly surprised. It removed about 80% of the dust and grime on the car and left it with a really nice shine! It isn't perfect but pretty darn close! A bottle of this lasted me 3 washes for a compact SUV, which puts it under $3 per wash. I highly recommend this between car washes to keep your vehicle looking great.
customer_reviews.author: Abishek

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioning sprayer
customer_reviews.text: How can you use a spray bottle when the sprayer just completely conks out. Terrible. Will not buy again. Will not buy other products either since I have no confindence anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Anonym S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Wash & Shine
customer_reviews.text: As an apartment dweller, this product has proven to be a must for keeping my car clean and shiny. I don't have the space or ability to traditionally wash my car, but this waterless wash is magical, and it couldn't be simpler. I just need this and some microfiber cloths! I love the way it leaves my car shining, and at a fraction of the price of regular drive-through wash and wax. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for an easy car wash alternative, or to anyone whose water access for a wash is limited!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W.

customer_reviews.title: Scratches!
customer_reviews.text: Washed my black wheels 2 days before I used this. Wheels were mostly clean but lost some luster. Hoping to restore some shine and depth, I used this along with a clean deep waffle rag, end result is scratched up wheels.
customer_reviews.author: TLyman

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful this product would do as it says, but all I got were streaks and a unpleasant smell. Not sure if it this is part of the issue, but my vehicle is dark blue. Also, I don't see how there is any wax component in the mix, as my car never got that slippery wax buffed feel.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Great in Between
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for me because I live in an apartment and believe it or not, there are no car wash establishments close by. I use this product as a "spot remover" and it literally takes no time at all to clean the car. I feel it is a good price and does exactly what it is supposed to do, clean the car without a hose!
customer_reviews.author: EmBee

customer_reviews.title: buy it
customer_reviews.text: Add my new car for the last four months and have not brought it to a car wash one just make sure you use a lot of Microsoft cloth and keep them clean as you will get a lot of dirt coming off on the rag had a car for 4 months And probably have well over half remaining looks like a bottle will be good for probably about a year
customer_reviews.author: Kent K.

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! I've been using it for a couple years now. Superior results. I usually run my car through the touchless wash if it's more than just dusty and then proceed with this. If it's not too dirty I just go to town. Microfiber towels and this keep everything looking good.
customer_reviews.author: myJimpants

customer_reviews.title: My car comes clean and shiny!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to use on my black 1994 Corvette that I use mainly as a show car and Sunday driver. I like the trigger spray because it dispenses just the right amount of the wash in a nice, even pattern. I bought the Meguiar's X2020 microfiber towels to use with the wash and I will purchase both again when I need more.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M

customer_reviews.title: Works well, great spray
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, I use this on those days where it's been a couple after me just washing my car and theirs pollen or just stuff that is easy to take off and this wash and wax makes my car look shinier then when I used a brush and soap haha but it also smells good so you dont have to worry about chemical scented hands after
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.text: Good product. Works very well, but the bottle came leaking. Had to use an extra spray bottle I had and transfer the liquid to there. You can use this to wipe the windshield but then use a glass cleaner like Invisible Glass to finish it up.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have a dark blue colored SUV which, logically, takes more care to avoid swirls and streaks when cleaning/waxing, since swirls, etc. show up much easier on dark colored vehicles. customer_reviews.author: PeteInSanDiego

product_meta.title: MEGUIAR'S G3626 Ultimate Waterless Wash & Wax, 26 Fluid Ounces
product_meta.description: Size:26-OuncePerfect for urban dwellers, those with limited access to water, or the hot rodder who just arrived at a cruise, Ultimate Waterless Wash & Wax safely lifts away dirt and grime while leaving behind a protective layer of hydrophobic wax. In as little as 15 minutes, this new formula can morph a drab and dirty appearance into a stunning, clean and shiny car, without a drop of water. What's more, depending on how dirty the car is, a single bottle, along with the help of a few microfiber towels, can wash and wax up to five average-sized cars. To use this spray, simply mist onto the surface of the vehicle and gently wipe away using a Meguiar's Supreme Shine or other high quality microfiber towel. Wash and Wax Anywhere spray's unique chemistry insures a scratch-free finish when used as directed, as special lubricants and cleaning agents safely loosen and then gently remove the dirt. Follow with a quick wipe from a clean, dry towel and the surface is left with a beautiful, glossy, just-waxed finish. Waterless Wash & Wax is also safe to use on all wheel types, plus rubber, vinyl and glass.
feature_bullets: ONE EASY STEP: Premium formula conveniently and gently washes and adds wax protection in one easy step. Can be used anywhere with no hose, bucket, or rinsing
WATER SPOT-FREE: Advanced chemistry contains a water spot-free formula coupled with a high-lubricity that protects the surface against swirling and scratching as it gently cleans
LONG-LASTING BARRIER: Advanced polymer chemistry leaves behind a glossy, synthetic wax barrier that lasts weeks
SAFE FOR GLOSSY PAINTS: Is safe and effective on all glossy paints and clear coat finishes, glass, chrome, polished metals, and plastic trim.
NO EQUIPMENT NEEDED: Ideal for those who do not have access to a hose, live in a city, or apartment, or are under water restrictions
